SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Build ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_BUILD_ID# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Sandbox ID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_VER_SANDBOX# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET BUILD INFO ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET BUILD INFO ACTION EXECUTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Running get build info command ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "GetBuildInfo" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@WIN
! Application ID : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_APP_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -appid &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Build Id : IF &UC4RB_VER_BUILD_ID# <> "" : SET &NUM_CHECK#=ISNUMERIC(&UC4RB_VER_BUILD_ID#) : IF &NUM_CHECK# <> 'Y' : STOP MSG, 50, "Incorrect Build ID, it can only be numeric." : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_BUILD_ID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -buildid &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Sandbox ID : IF &UC4RB_VER_SANDBOX# <> "" : SET &NUM_CHECK#=ISNUMERIC(&UC4RB_VER_SANDBOX#) : IF &NUM_CHECK# <> 'Y' : STOP MSG, 50, "Incorrect Sandbox ID, it can only be numeric." : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_SANDBOX# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@WIN : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#," -sandboxid &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT "Command executed :: &UC4RB_CMD#"
&UC4RB_CMD#
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.JOB_OUTPUT@WIN
!------------------------------------------Check error level -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_VERACODE.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@WIN
